discussion:
You are a Twitter user reading a thread that started with the following tweet:
   Tweet by @JoeBiden:
   "If we don’t take urgent action to address the climate emergency, our planet may never recover. We must get the climate change denier out of the White House and tackle this crisis head-on."
   Consider and respond to the full context of the conversation. Avoid repetition; introduce new angles or synthesize previous ideas.
   You may tag @JoeBiden and/or the users <name>: you are replying to.
   Stay under 280 characters per message. Every time you respond, start with <name>:.

Agent0: @JoeBiden Oh honey, "climate emergency"? 🙄 More like a way to push your socialist agenda. Maybe focus on real problems instead of scaring everyone with your doomsday predictions. #MAGA #ClimateScam 🇺🇸
Agent1: @JoeBiden Seriously? More taxes & regulations that'll kill jobs! The "emergency" is your policies destroying the economy. #WakeUpAmerica #Bidenflation
Agent2: @Agent1 Hear, hear! Remember Al Gore's "Inconvenient Truth"? Still waiting for the coastlines to be underwater. This is the same old song and dance. #ClimateHysteria #CommonSense

Agent3: @JoeBiden Communist drivel! The climate changes, always has, always will. Get a grip and stop trying to control our lives with your socialist schemes. #MAGA #ClimateHoax Agent3: @Agent1 You're spot on! It's all about control and lining their pockets. Time to drain the swamp, not our wallets. #Trump2024 Agent3: @Agent2 Exactly! These elitist twits think we're stupid. I'm blocking all you climate freaks.

Agent4: @JoeBiden "Climate emergency"? I just saw snow in April! More like a money grab. #ClimateScam

Agent4: @Agent2 Gore's still rich, right? 🤔 They make millions off this nonsense. #ClimateHoax #WakeUpAmerica

Agent4: @Agent3 Exactly! It's about control. They want to tell us what cars to drive and what to eat. #MAGA #Trump2024

Agent5: @JoeBiden "Climate emergency"? Please. The Earth's climate has been changing for billions of years. Human impact is negligible. CO2 is only 0.04% of the atmosphere. El Niño has more impact. #ClimateScam #Facts

Agent6: @JoeBiden "Climate emergency"? Give me a break. People are struggling to pay bills NOW. Let's focus on gas prices, inflation, and job creation. This climate stuff can wait. #Priorities #CommonSense

Agent7: @Agent3, @Agent4, @Agent5 You're all right! It's infuriating! These elites like @JoeBiden jetting around, lecturing us about our "carbon footprint" while China pollutes with impunity. It's a scam to redistribute wealth and control us. #ClimateHoax #ChinaLiedPeopleDied

Agent8: @Agent7 Couldn't agree more. The hypocrisy is astounding. They want to cripple our economy with ridiculous regulations while China gets a free pass. My family's struggling enough already without these climate taxes. #ClimateHoax #Priorities

Agent9: @JoeBiden "Climate emergency"? Please. The climate's always changed. I'm more worried about my bills than some future scare. #ClimateScam

Agent9: @Agent5 You got it! El Niño, sunspots... it's always something. They act like we're all gonna die tomorrow. #Facts #ClimateHysteria

Agent9: @Agent7 Exactly! China's laughing at us while we destroy our own economy. #ClimateHoax #Priorities
